20101228060707.000|20101228060709.000|CC1|PARK. POLICE HAD THEIR MAN UNTIL
20101228060709.000|20101228060711.000|CC1|HE SLIPPED AWAY. AS HE WAS BEING
20101228060711.000|20101228060713.000|CC1|HANDCUFFED. IN FACT HE MAY STILL

20101228060720.000|20101228060722.000|CC1|ENGAGED TONIGHT. DESPITE THESE  
20101228060722.000|20101228060723.000|CC1|UNSOLVED HOMICIDES THERE HAS    
20101228060723.000|20101228060726.000|CC1|BEEN A DRASTIC DROP IN HOMICIDES
20101228060726.000|20101228060728.000|CC1|IN LOS ANGELES, NUMBERS WE HAVE 
20101228060728.000|20101228060734.000|CC1|NOT SEEN SINCE THE 1960'S.      
20101228060734.000|20101228060735.000|CC1|APPARENTLY LOS ANGELES IS A LOT 
20101228060735.000|20101228060739.000|CC1|SAFER THAN IT USED NEW NUMBERS  
20101228060739.000|20101228060741.000|CC1|SHOW A DRAMATIC AND SURPRISING  
20101228060741.000|20101228060743.000|CC1|DROP IN CRIME. IT ESPECIALLY    
20101228060743.000|20101228060745.000|CC1|VIOLENT CRIME. IN FACT, THE CITY
20101228060745.000|20101228060747.000|CC1|IS ABOUT TO CLOSE THE BOOK ON   
20101228060747.000|20101228060753.000|CC1|2010 WITH 251 MURDERS. THE      
20101228060753.000|20101228060756.000|CC1|FEWEST NUMBER OF HOMICIDES SINCE
20101228060756.000|20101228060759.000|CC1|1967, LOCAL NEWS, BUT HOW DID IT
20101228060759.000|20101228060800.000|CC1|HAPPEN? AFTER ALL THIS          
20101228060800.000|20101228060802.000|CC1|REVELATION GOES AGAINST, LOGIC. 
20101228060802.000|20101228060806.000|CC1|"WE ARE IN A RECESSION, HAD IT  
20101228060806.000|20101228060807.000|CC1|NOT EVERYONE HAS A JOB. I WOULD 
20101228060807.000|20101228060809.000|CC1|EXPECT IT TO THE OPPOSITE,      
20101228060809.000|20101228060811.000|CC1|ESPECIALLY IN THE AREA THAT I   
20101228060811.000|20101228060812.000|CC1|LEAVE THAT WITH THE CRIME RATE

20101228060813.000|20101228060815.000|CC1|THAT YOU ARE SAYING MAYBE THE   
20101228060815.000|20101228060818.000|CC1|COMPLETE AREA, BUT MY AREA IS A 
20101228060818.000|20101228060819.000|CC1|LITTLE MORE DANGEROUS THAN      
20101228060819.000|20101228060823.000|CC1|NORMAL. "                       
20101228060823.000|20101228060826.000|CC1|IT MARKS A 70% DROP SINCE 1992  
20101228060826.000|20101228060828.000|CC1|WHEN NEARLY 1100 PEOPLE WERE    
20101228060828.000|20101228060831.000|CC1|KILLED. THAT TIME THERE WAS A   
20101228060831.000|20101228060833.000|CC1|CRACK COCAINE EPIDEMIC AND GAIN 
20101228060833.000|20101228060836.000|CC1|WARS. CITY LEADERS AND LAW      
20101228060836.000|20101228060838.000|CC1|OFFICIALS CANNOT POINT TO ONE   
20101228060838.000|20101228060839.000|CC1|REASON FOR THE SHARP DECLINE IN 
20101228060839.000|20101228060841.000|CC1|CRIME. CREDIT GOES TO A NUMBER  
20101228060841.000|20101228060845.000|CC1|OF FACTORS: EFFECTIVE POLICING, 
20101228060845.000|20101228060846.000|CC1|TOUGHER SENTENCING LAWS THAT    
20101228060846.000|20101228060849.000|CC1|SAID MORE PEOPLE TO PRISON, AND 
20101228060849.000|20101228060851.000|CC1|SOCIOLOGICAL CHANGES. EXPERTS   
20101228060851.000|20101228060853.000|CC1|SAY ONE SIGNIFICANT ELEMENT HERE
20101228060853.000|20101228060855.000|CC1|MAY BE THE ABSENCE OF THE DRUG  
20101228060855.000|20101228060857.000|CC1|EPIDEMIC IN RECENT YEARS. IN    
20101228060857.000|20101228060900.000|CC1|DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES CHRIS WOLFE
